name: Back To School Free: Math Test - Logical Reasoning for Adults & Kids
name_original: Back To School Free: Math Test - Logical Reasoning for Adults & Kids
description:
What is "Back To School"?

"Back To School" is a running game ... for your bain !
This is a new concept for a totally smart and addictive game:
- Find the good number to complete the formula.
- If you right, you earn time. If not, you lose time.

The goal is to be alive as long as possible!

GOOD LUCK !

In this game :
Retina Display
Intuitive & addictive gameplay
HD on iPad
iPhone 5 optimized
